idea:
1. Well designed academic system and defined lesson plan which makes a child to make and follow a plan of his own.

2. Concept of QR Book is key element which we have added in tie up with Chetana Publications. Instead of normal notes we have preferred QR Book which is a magical book for students. QR Book (combination of exercise book alongwith a teacher in a book for solving problems and explaining a concept) which will be a key factor for writing practice for student and their doubt solving as it is need of an hour during such online session where students are not getting writing practice. One more benefit of QR Book is that content consists of videos of our own teachers which makes easier for students to understand.

idea:
We’re a hybrid tech startup based in sunny Goa, India. With $200k YTD AR and serving 100+ brands across North America and India with our smart tech solutions and B2B SaaS product. 


We know the power of good partnerships. We partner with founders and entrepreneurs to launch and scale the next big idea, taking it from MVP to a true business.


What you’ll find within Workshore: Friendly banter, collaboration, steady growth, and cat memes. What you won’t: Micromanaging and bad vibes.
name: Workshore
